subject: Steroids
Tests and Testing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Diana Taurasi, a former all-American at Connecticut who has led the Mercury to two W.N.B.A. titles, tested positive for a mild stimulant while playing in Turkey, her lawyer said.
snippet: Diana Taurasi, a former all-American at Connecticut who has led the Mercury to two W.N.B.A. titles, tested positive for a mild stimulant while playing in Turkey, her lawyer said.
